answers.answer: I have to take the three hour glucose test,but I haven't scheduled the appointment yet. Im scared and trying to change my diet so my levels can come down. ( even though I dont eat alot of sweets)
Most people pass the test. Have you had any symptoms that you could be? Because I have. It has really nothing to do with sweets. It more how your body produces the insulin. It STINKS!!!!!!!!!

Apparently with the high fasting levels it means that I have Gestational Diabetes. I have to fast again tonight and go back in the morning for them to check the fasting levels one more time to make sure. If I fail which more than likely I will than they have to start me on taking my sugar levels and also taking medication.

Well my doctor gave me the one hour glucose test and I failed which is why he wants me to schedule a appointment to take the 3 hour test. He also gave.me a diet to follow for 3 days before I take the three hour test. However I've been following it for the last week to improve my levels because I dont want to fail again and be diagnosed with gestational diabetes.

question: At my doctor's office for a 3 hour glucose test and after making me wait an hour to be seen they tested my fasting levels and said they are too high and I have to reschedule. This *****. Anyone else have this happen?
title: Pissed
